text: The Keys of the Kingdom is a 1944 American drama movie directed by John M. Stahl and was based on the 1941 novel of the same name by A. J. Cronin. It stars Gregory Peck, Thomas Mitchell, Vincent Price, Roddy McDowall, Sir Cedric Hardwicke, Ruth Nelson, Edith Barrett, Peggy Ann Garner, Anne Revere and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for 4 Academy Awards in 1945. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1944 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John M. Stahl Category:Movies set in Scotland Category:Movies set in China Category:Movies set in the 19th century Category:Movies set in the 20th century Category:Movies about Catholicism
title: The Keys of the Kingdom (movie)
